personal.name: Osazee Jedidiah O
personal.title: Blockchain Developer, Program Manager and Data Scientist
personal.bio: I am a data-centric, self-motivated, dedicated, goal-oriented individual with decent moral Values and Ethicates along with a high-energy level, honed communication skills, strong organizational skills, and meticulous attention to detail. I am involved in innovating and building Dapps that solve key problems in society and driving massive adoption of blockchain technology. I am currently interested in building to scaling ethereum(L2 solutions) and Deploy Products that integrates A.I and Blockchain technology.
personal.subtitle: I love exploring new things!
personal.description: I'm a Blockchain developer, Program Manager and Data scientist. Primarily interested in Blockchain Development and Leading teams to deploying quality products on time and in budget. I enjoy learning new skills and implementing them in real life!

experience.title: Blockchain Developer
responsibilities: Managed and developed a supply chain protocol on the ethereum blockchain
Worked autonomously on building a supply chain protocol on hyperledger
Liaised with remote team members across the country

experience.title: Data Alchemist - Quest Designer
responsibilities: Designed and managed an quest for the covalent Data alchemist program
Provided technical support and organised workshops for Data alchemist
Organised a Hackathon-in-a-box for the covalent community in Lagos

experience.title: Blockchain Developer (Smart Contracts)
responsibilities: Designed and developed smart contract with solidity, javascript and hardhat
Designed and developed upgradeable proxy contracts using EIP2535
Designed and developed smart contracts for deployment on ZkEvm

experience.title: Senior Program Manager/ Technical Program Manager
responsibilities: Established and implemented short- and long-range goals, objectives, and operating procedures
Managed a portfolio of AI projects, ensuring coordination of shared resources which lead to a revenue of $2million
Developed a comprehensive monitoring of issues and dependencies to remove any roadblocks resulting in 99% of milestones achieved on time
Fostered a culture of robust documentation both internally and externally, reducing the number of customer support request by 20%
Led onboarding process acting as customer champion to ensure quick adaptation resulting in user engagement rate of 72%
Created and implemented PMO best practices, ensuring alignment with SDLC and business process using Agile Methodology

featured_projects.title: DexSense
featured_projects.description: Designed and implemented React-based Web Application which utilizes the Covalent API to display DEX metrics across multiple chains supported by covalent.

featured_projects.title: Afrione Project
featured_projects.description: Blockchain-powered e-voucher system enabling cross-border payments and financial inclusion across Africa, the US, and the UK. Commissioned by Blockwave to design and deliver the full architecture and software stack.

featured_projects.title: Prospero Credit Platform
featured_projects.description: Next-generation AI-powered credit platform that uses AI to match borrowers and lenders in real-time, performs AI-driven credit scoring using financial and behavioral data, and records all loans on a private blockchain.
